name: DxD
description:
From MAXIMUM HEART GAMES comes DxD, a action horror game for PC that lets you experience the epic battle against hordes of zombies.

Survive

Fight your way through a palette of different weapons. Survive Waves by killing Zombies and earn in-game money that can be spend through the game. Costumize your player. Be in controle of a tank. Pull up traps. Or escape a heavy situation by calling a drone. The possabilities are endless.

Maps

A variety of different environments are coming for you. Day or Night. It's your choice.
